==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かの|じょ|yomi=ko}}

===Etymology===
From {{l|en|she}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|かのじょ|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Pronoun===
{{ja-pos|pronoun|かのじょ}}

# [[she]], [[her]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''彼女'''は大変頭がいい。|'''かのじょ''' は たいへん あたま が い.い。|'''She''' is very intelligent.}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かのじょ}}

# [[girlfriend]]
#: {{ja-usex|あぁ、彼女がほしいなぁ…|あぁ、かのじょ が ほしい なぁ…|Aahh, I wish I has a girlfriend...}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{qualifier|to distinguish from the sense of "girlfriend"}} {{ja-l|カノジョ}}
